file_content.text: People keep greeting me in the halls--like we're equals. It's disgusting.
Most of what Sana-Rae says is nonsense, but she was somewhat insightful this morning.
I thought I'd miss Korriban's schemes, but working together has actually been... productive.
Apparently, we're barred from strangling officers. I'm starting to regret my decision to join the Alliance.
For people who claim to have no emotion, Jedi are a sensitive bunch.
Master Lara smiled at me. And I didn't feel like vomiting. It was... strange.
New recruits arrive today. I hope they cower. I love a good cowering.
Perhaps I'll ask Master Lara if she wants to play sabacc again.
We grow stronger every day. I can sense Zakuul's fear.
